# zea-menu-itemset

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                              | Type          | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------- | ----------- |
| `parentItem`  | `parent-item`  | The item this subitems belongs to                                        | `any`         | `undefined` |
| `radioSelect` | `radio-select` | Whether the children should have checkboxes and behave as a radio button | `boolean`     | `false`     |
| `rootMenu`    | --             | The root menu this item belongs to                                       | `HTMLElement` | `undefined` |
| `shown`       | `shown`        | Whether it is/should be shown                                            | `boolean`     | `false`     |
| `type`        | `type`         | Menu type                                                                | `string`      | `''`        |
